    colors

    functions

    shade 

    @function shade() { ... }

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • black

    tint 

    @function tint() { ... }

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • white

    check-color 

    @function check-color() { ... }

    Parameters

    None.

    variables

    white 

    $white: #fff;

    Used by

    • tint

    black 

    $black: #000;

    Used by

    • shade

    grayscale 

    $grayscale: (
	"01":  mix($black, $white, 10%),
	"02":  mix($black, $white, 20%),
	"03":  mix($black, $white, 30%),
	"04":  mix($black, $white, 40%),
	"05":  mix($black, $white, 50%),
	"06":  mix($black, $white, 60%),
	"07":  mix($black, $white, 70%),
	"08":  mix($black, $white, 80%),
	"09":  mix($black, $white, 90%),
) !default;

    default-color 

    $default-color: #e4e4e4;

    primary-color 

    $primary-color: #3662ad;

    accent-color 

    $accent-color: #f36c0a;

    inverse-color 

    $inverse-color: mix($primary-color, map-get($grayscale, 08), 20%);

    state-success 

    $state-success: #5cb85c !default;

    state-info 

    $state-info: #5bc0de !default;

    state-warning 

    $state-warning: #f0ad4e !default;

    state-danger 

    $state-danger: #d9534f !default;

    default__palette 

    $default__palette: (
    'default':  $default__color,
) !default;

    inverse__palette 

    $inverse__palette: (
    'inverse': $inverse__color,
) !default;

    primary__palette 

    $primary__palette: (
    'cta':   $accent__color,
    'main':  $primary__color,
) !default;

    neutral__palette 

    $neutral__palette: (
    'alt1':  mix($primary__color, map-get($grayscale, 07), 50%),
    'alt2':  mix($primary__color, map-get($grayscale, 05), 45%),
    'alt3':  mix($primary__color, map-get($grayscale, 03), 40%),
) !default;

    state__palette 

    $state__palette: (
    'success':  $state--success,
    'info':     $state--info,
    'warning':  $state--warning,
    'danger':   $state--danger,
) !default;

    classic__palette 

    $classic__palette: (
    'white':  $white,
    'black':  $black,
) !default;

    Parameters

    None.

    Unitless number

    breakpoints

    variables

    breakpoint-mobile 

    $breakpoint-mobile: 544px;

    breakpoint-tablet 

    $breakpoint-tablet: 768px;

    breakpoint-desktop 

    $breakpoint-desktop: 992px;

    breakpoint-large 

    $breakpoint-large: 1200px;

    breakpoints 

    $breakpoints: (
	"sm":  $breakpoint-mobile,
	"md":  $breakpoint-tablet,
	"lg":  $breakpoint-desktop,
	"xl":  $breakpoint-large,
) !default;

    fonts

    variables

    icon 

    $icon: (
	"FontAwesome": (
		(
            "name": "fontawesome-webfont",
            "formats": ("eot", "woff2", "woff", "ttf", "svg")
		),
	)
);

    sans 

    $sans: (
    "Avenir": (
        (
            "name": "avenirltstd-roman-webfont",
            "formats": ("eot", "woff", "ttf", "svg"),
            "weight": "400"
        ), (
            "name": "avenirltstd-medium-webfont",
            "formats": ("eot", "woff", "ttf", "svg"),
            "weight": "500"
        ), (
            "name": "avenirheavy-webfont",
            "formats": ("eot", "woff", "ttf", "svg"),
            "weight": "700"
        ),
    )
);

    paths

    variables

    g-root 

    $g-root: "../";

    g-font 

    $g-font: $g-root + "font/";

    g-img 

    $g-img: $g-root + "img/";
